location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lieutenant Robert Taylor, in charge at the Bushire Residency to Stephen Babbington, Secretary to the Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is a response to communications dated 28, and 29 July 1812. It states that the troops and weapons mentioned are currently in Bushire awaiting directions from the Ambassador, Sir Gore Ouseley.
